alert.note: Alert for Debeque to Silt Corridor; Flat Tops; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 4:22PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Garfield County through 445 PM MDT... At 420 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Parachute, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, pea size hail and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rifle. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 80 and 93. Colorado 13 between mile markers 1 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Debeque to Silt Corridor; Flat Tops; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus
